attributes.action: SAY NO TO PREMIERSHIP FOOTBALL OVERSEAS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/football/eng_prem/7232390.stm

THIS IS WRONG!

WE, THE FANS, SHOULD NOT HAVE TO PUT UP WITH THIS

GET THE CORPORATE FAT CATS OUT OF FOOTBALL BEFORE THEY KILL IT FOREVER

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
